TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationManager Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class ApplicationManager sealed : MarshalByRefObject

Docs.summary: Manages ASP.NET application domains for an ASP.NET hosting application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>物件所提供的主控環境中的 ASP.NET 應用程式物件的存留期管理。 它會負責：
- 啟用及初始化 ASP.NET 應用程式。
- 管理應用程式存留期和物件的存留期的應用程式中註冊。
- 公開用來處理 ASP.NET 應用程式要求裝載環境的物件。
- 提供在任何給定時刻裝載處理序中執行應用程式的清單。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.Close%2A>方法可減少使用的應用程式管理員，為 0 時，應用程式的參考計數<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.Close%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.ShutdownAll%2A>方法。

Docs.summary: Creates an object for the specified application domain and object type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

Docs.exception: A physical path for the application does not exist.

Docs.param: The unique identifier for the application that owns the object.
The type of the object to create.
The virtual path to the application.
The physical path to the application.
to throw an exception if an object of the specified type is currently registered; to return the existing registered object of the specified type.
Docs.summary: Creates an object for the specified application domain based on type, virtual and physical paths, and a Boolean value indicating failure behavior when an object of the specified type already exists.
Docs.returns: A new object of the specified .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法用來建立並註冊應用程式中的物件。 可以建立每個類型只能有一個物件。 如果您需要建立多個相同類型的物件，您必須實作的物件 factory。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。
唯一的應用程式識別項所識別的每個應用程式，會執行它自己的應用程式定義域中。 <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法中指定的應用程式的應用程式定義域中建立指定型別的物件`appID`參數。 如果應用程式定義域不存在指定的應用程式，會建立一個物件建立之前。
`failIfExists`參數控制行為的<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法時指定之類型的物件已經存在於應用程式。 當`failIfExists`是`true`、<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。
當`failIfExists`是`false`、<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法會傳回指定之型別的現有已註冊的物件。
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法呼叫的多載會採用額外`throwOnError`參數`throwOnError`設`false`。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例是已登錄的物件的物件 factory 設計模式實作。 使用處理站模式，可讓您註冊多個物件執行個體。 此範例包含兩個物件： `SampleComponent`，它是應用程式的物件會使用多個執行個體，和`SampleComponentFactory`，它負責管理一份`SampleComponent`執行個體。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: is \- or - is not a valid application path. \- or - does not implement the interface.
is and an object of the specified type is already registered.

Docs.returns: A new object of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法提供`throwOnError`參數，可讓您控制是否裝載初始化例外狀況擲回。 多載<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.CreateObject%2A>方法並未提供`throwOnError`呼叫參數設定為使用這個多載`false`。

Docs.exception: is \- or - is not a valid application path. \- or - does not implement the interface.
is and an object of the specified type is already registered.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager GetApplicationManager() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetApplicationManager () As ApplicationManager

Docs.summary: Returns the single instance of the object associated with this ASP.NET host process.
Docs.returns: The single instance of the object associated with the ASP.NET host process that is running.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 只有一個執行個體<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>由 ASP.NET 主機處理序預設應用程式定義域中建立物件。 如果執行個體<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>類別沒有<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.GetApplicationManager%2A>方法會先建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>類別，然後傳回新建立的物件。 如果執行個體<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>先前建立類別，<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.GetApplicationManager%2A>方法會傳回現有的物件。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.GetApplicationManager%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>Web 應用程式的執行個體。
[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo/CS/applicationInfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo/VB/applicationInfovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object InitializeLifetimeService() cil managed
Public Overrides Function InitializeLifetimeService () As Object

Docs.summary: Gives the application domain an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService%2A>其基底類別中的方法。 它會一律傳回`null`，因而會防止建立會限制應用程式定義域的存留期的使用期。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsIdle() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether all applications hosted by the process are idle and not processing requests.
Docs.returns: if all applications in the process are idle; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.IsIdle%2A>方法會傳回`true`如果處理序所裝載的所有應用程式會處於閒置狀態。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Open() cil managed

Docs.summary: Makes a thread-safe increment to the user reference count of the application manager instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ShutdownAll() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.ShutdownAll%2A>方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.InitiateShutdown%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在此管理的所有應用程式定義域<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager>執行個體; 不過，<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.ShutdownAll%2A>方法可以從受管理的應用程式定義域之外呼叫。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ShutdownApplication(string appId) cil managed

Docs.param: The unique identifier of the application to unload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.ShutdownApplication%2A>方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.InitiateShutdown%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法特定的應用程式定義域中; 不過，<xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager.ShutdownApplication%2A>方法可以從外部的受管理應用程式定義域呼叫。

MemberSignature.Value: public void StopObject (string appId, Type type);
.method public hidebysig instance void StopObject(string appId, class System.Type type) cil managed
public: void StopObject(System::String ^ appId, Type ^ type);

Docs.param: The unique identifier for the application that owns the object.
The type of the object to unload.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified object from the list of registered objects in an application. If the object to be removed is the last remaining object in the list of registered objects in an application, the application is unloaded.
